tools.name: runShellCommand
tools.description: Run a terminal command in the system shell

tools.name: runPythonFile
tools.description: Execute a Python file and return output

filePath.description: Path to the Python file to execute

args.description: Optional arguments to pass to the Python script

tools.name: readDirectory
tools.description: List files and folders in a directory

dirPath.description: Path to the directory to read (default: workspace root)

tools.name: copyFile
tools.description: Copy a file from one location to another

tools.name: createFile
tools.description: Create a new file with specified contents

filePath.description: Path to the file to create

content.description: Content to write to the file

tools.name: readFile
tools.description: Read the content of a file

filePath.description: Path to the file to read

tools.name: editFile
tools.description: Edit the content of an existing file

filePath.description: Path to the file to edit

content.description: Content to add or replace with

startLine.description: Start line for replace operation (0-based, inclusive)

endLine.description: End line for replace operation (0-based, inclusive)

tools.name: deleteFile
tools.description: Delete a file from the filesystem

filePath.description: Path to the file to delete
